sentence.Network_en: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is "inviolable".
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

sentence.Network_en: Basic law or tradition was considered inviolable.
sentence.Network_cn: 基本法律或传统被认为神圣不可侵犯.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... intransigence 不妥协 inviolable 不可侵犯的 irrational 荒谬的.
雷字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 雷达站〖 radarstation〗 雷打不动〖 final;inviolable;nottobealteredunderanycircumstances〗.
不可分离 English,... ... 不可屏蔽的中断 nonmaskable interrupt 不可侵犯 inviolability;inviolable 不可侵犯权 inviolability.
inviolability 神圣inviolable 神圣的inviolably 不可侵犯地

list.abs: It is an inviolable mission of the entire Chinese people to reunify the motherland ., 实现祖国统一是全体中国人民的神圣使命.
Taiwan is an inalienable part of the inviolable territory of China .台湾是中国神圣领土不可分割的一部分。
it is the inviolable duty of all Chinese people , including our compatriots in Taiwan , to accomplish the great task of reunifying the motherland .完成统一祖国的大业是包括台湾同胞在内的全中国人民的神圣职责。
...人的身体的伤害，“人身”（Personal insurance）就是针对人的生命和身体伤害保的险，“人身不可侵犯”（Personal inviolability）是对不得伤害他人身体之告诫。（注：就所有这些包含Personal的词素的术语的英文形式以及汉译，参见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from Latin inviolabilis, from in- 'not' + violabilis 'able to be violated' (from the verb violare)

entry.tran: 不可触犯的;不可违背的
entry.def: If a law or principle is inviolable, you must not break it.

example.ex: The game had a single inviolable rule: obstacles were to be overcome, not circumvented.
example.tran: 该比赛有一个规则不可违背：必须跳过而不能绕过障碍物。

entry.tran: 不可更改的;不可侵犯的
entry.def: If a country says its borders are inviolable, it means they must not be changed or crossed without permission.

example.ex: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is 'inviolable'.
example.tran: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

means.word_mean: 1. that cannot be transgressed or dishonored;

sentences.sentence: "the person of the king is inviolable"

means.word_mean: 4. not capable of being violated or infringed;

auth_sentence.content: Within Bengali families, individual names are sacred, inviolable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Within Bengali families, individual names are sacred, inviolable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Within Bengali families, individual names are sacred, inviolable.

auth_sentence.content: Seth's family was inviolable, Melissa was learning a unit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seth's family was inviolable, Melissa was learning a unit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seth's family was inviolable, Melissa was learning a unit.

auth_sentence.content: Sitting there, plump and content, she seems inviolable in her impending motherhood.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sitting there, plump and content, she seems inviolable in her impending motherhood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sitting there, plump and content, she seems inviolable in her impending motherhood.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

sentences.en: Basic law or tradition was considered inviolable.
sentences.cn: 基本法律或传统被认为神圣不可侵犯。
